NBA 2021 Season Analysis Mouwei Lin (lm3756); Frank Li (zl3204); Linhao Yu (ly2590) 2022-12-13 Chapter 1 Introduction The National Basketball Association (NBA) is a professional basketball league in North America. The league is composed of 30 teams (29 in the United States and 1 in Canada) and is one of the major professional sports leagues in the United States and Canada. It is the premier menâ€™s professional basketball league in the world. As NBA attract millions of viewers each year, it is definitely one of the most famous league in the world now. That also means there are plenty of data collected and ready to be analyzed. In this final project, we will focus on 2021 to 2022 NBA season, try to use data to persuade people why some teams win the game and why they are extraordinary this year.
